column3: “Time stands still with Flowerbomb. This strain is definitely a heavy hitter. I had a cold when I tried this in Amsterdam, so that may have caused me to feel the effects of this strain a bit more than most people. After taking a few hits, my body felt super heavy and all of my movements and thoughts seemed to slow. way. down. All I wanted to do was sit in a quite space and nap. While my friend was super hungry after t...”

“I Grew this strain from one of Greenhouse Seeds feminized seeds. The plant is strong and robust, Huge fan leaves with hints of blue and purple a very dark green. The flowers are very dense and compact, Not a big producer but the quality of the flowers is High Grade! It was finished the second week of October here in Northern California, The flowers look great in a jar! Ver dark green with bright red hairs, tons of cr...”

“I love how this strain made me feel. I was really relaxed and kind of not motivated to do much after about 20 minutes of being high. 
Like every strain, whenever it hits me I am mostly energetic and hyper and jumping around. 
For most strains these feelings continue to flow throughout the high (the next few hours). 

With Flowerbomb Kush however, this is not exactly the case. 
An Indica high is quite different from a...”
“Love the name”

“Wow. From the first bowl this strain instantly became my new #1. Super dense hybrid-like buds that are covered in trichromes.. The high hits you fast but the full effects don't set in for a good 10-15 min, however they can last forever. Flowerbomb perfectly incorporates the genetics of it's two parents, green crack and og kush. This is an all day everyday strain, perfect for anxiety and insomnia alike. Not for beginn...”
“one of my favorite strains ,citrus earthy typa taste with skunk when you exhale”
“Got an eighth while in Vegas, buds tend to be small, great if you're walking and want to experience everything around you, it opens your eyes a second time to say...”

“Tried this at the Greenhouse in Amsterdam last year. Fell in love with the smell and appearance of the flower instantly. The smoke was thick, heavy and very flavourful. Potent as all hell and long lasting so it's definitely more for the seasoned smoker. 10/10 for my all time favourite strain.”
“On of the best strains ever had! Euphoric and uplifting..it takes you really high, along with the ultimate mellow mood you will ever experience! Highly recomended!”

“Light head high that gradually escalates to a relaxed euphoria.  Synesthesia effects on skin with light penetration into the muscle beginning about 5-8 minutes into the session.  Very relaxing and calming indica strain with more of a clear focused head high that allows for work.  Great for after work to begin the evening with.”

“I was grown and smoked the Flowerbomb Kush.
The cultivation did not really pay off.
The smoke is good. Strong stoned effect. Almost immediately starts to work. Medical level.
The taste is clean, white pepper and lightly spicy ginger. The smell slightly citrusy, slightly anise.
My summary of my assessment: 4/5.”
“Incredible strain. Smoked it while writing this review. Watching drillbit Taylor getting ready for bed. Long day at work tomorrow. Excellent strain for relaxation and stress relief!”
“gd gas,,hood review soufside #Highlife”
“Just the right balance”

“Flowebomb kush is one of my top -10 favorites. Good high, taste good...gets me creative in ways. 
😱”

“You can definetly notice that this has some connection with Green Crack. A great strain to help people who have a tendency to overthink secondary to anxiety. Once smoked, it has a perfect balance of a sedative-like effect mixed with a mild/moderate cerebral buzz. It will have you laughing at everything and you will quickly forget what you were once stressing about prior to smoking.  A great strain all around and land...”
“I will fear this strains extremely powerful hits.... amazing high too very sativa dominant, lotta energy shud get”
“🌲🌲🌲This is a very nice strain.. I'm a fan of sativa so I didn't want the drowsy effect of Indica so I was hesitant but Ol boi this is a great Hybrid 👍🏾👍🏾🌲🌲🌲”
“9.7... One of the best I've ever smoked. My buddy got it from a guy in FL. Little bit of cotton mouth. But some A+ for sure”
“It is fucking great”
“Good for appetite, pain relief and insomnia.”
“This definitely blew me away.”
“Really nice!  It gives me a nice mellow high, and is pretty potent to boot!  Flavour is light and floral at the beginning, and holds it pretty well throughout a bowl.”

“Wow! Picked up a couple grams from my local dispensary. When I got home, I packed a bowl, put on a record and couldn't help but dance. Im a big dude, so me dance don't happen to often. Recommended to anyone feelin down or need a pick me up!”
“Wonderful. ..A simply nice, zoned ...happy feeling..smooth piney taste!”

“Best use in the evening or night time.
Strong body relaxation”

“My friend kept telling me how this was real fruity tasting and that I'd really enjoy it and he was right! I absolutely love this strain! I found it to have a more earthy/spicy taste but smelt slightly fruity. Currently Watching Getting Doug With High while smoking this! If someone from the show sees this do more shows with an audience! and have them smoke this because oh my fuck that would be rad!!!”
“Love the taste and relaxed feeling. Helps me be stress free”

“My favorite strain. Very complex flavor that to me is never the same and tastes very sweet. Not a strain for beginners. Heavy body high that relaxes away the stress of the day and gives a good nights sleep.”
“Good Mello Erb💨👌🏾”
“Found some flower bomb found in clarksville..nice smell...good taste...and good buzz...helped with pain in back and knees..very relaxing”
“I got a really heavy high which was nice but found myself paranoid”

“Makes u silly. Nice cause not a lot heart racing. It definitely slow things down. I've written like complex feminist disablity theory while on and it came out grammatically terrible but still made  sense. Not a good vinyl buddy though Doesn't make music crazy or do much for visual effects. Doesn't get rid pain just sort turns your pain into itchy hot feeling. Couldn't get much work done but I felt better painwise nex...”
“You can really tell that there is some Green Crack in here. Flowerbomb Kush, (name included) is absolutely bonkers. Great high, great packaging, etc.”

“You can definetly notice that this has some connection with Green Crack. A great strain to help people who have a tendency to overthink secondary to anxiety. Once smoked, it has a perfect balance of a sedative-like effect mixed with a mild/moderate cerebral buzz. It will have you laughing at everything and you will quickly forget what you were once stressing about prior to smoking.  A great strain all around and land...”
“Super heady. Feels like bursting out of skin. Anxiety. Good but if not mindful can get anxious.”
“Fuckin perfect”

“Flowebomb kush is one of my top -10 favorites. Good high, taste good...gets me creative in ways. 
😱”
“Just the right balance”
“What a nice strain beautiful taste and amazing effect! Nice big tight buds with a heavy scent! A must try!!  I rate it 4.5 out of 5 not for beginners lol!!”
“Very good strain. Nice smell of almost a lemony earthy cookie dough to best describe it and smokes great. Won't mind getting this again since the effects gave me a fantastic sleep!!!”
“This strain is intense from the beginning and will last for a few hours. Beginners should not smoke to much or the bomb will sit you down, and you will definitely loose track of time. Top 5”
“My first time with this was good, the high lasted a few hours and it just made me feel really happy and relaxed and when I got home I slept the best I had in months”
